title: SI Data Alumni
desc: An information system for managing alumni data, publishing news, and supporting multi-level user access.

title: Pst! Sukai ya
desc: A survey web app where users can manage questions, view statistics, and archive survey data, while the public can submit responses.

title: SI Masjid Ad-Dienul Amin
desc: An information system for Ad-Dienul Amin Mosque with a public landing page and multi-level user roles to manage finance, assets, activity schedules, and news.

title: Three Men's Morris
desc: A browser-based implementation of the traditional strategy board game 'Three Men's Morris', where two players take turns placing and moving their pawns to align them diagonally or block the opponent.
